fr.gouv.vitam.common.external.client

Class VitamRequestIterator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.common.external.client.VitamRequestIterator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VitamAutoCloseable, AutoCloseable, Iterator<T>

    public class VitamRequestIterator<T>
extends Object
implements VitamAutoCloseable, Iterator<T>
    Utility to help with Http based Cursor that implements real Database Cursor on server side

                                                                   boolean active,

        Helper for server and client to set the needed headers
        Parameters:
        builder - the current ResponseBuilder
        active - True for create or continue, False for inactive (X-Cursor)
        xcursorId - may be null, else contains the current X-Cursor-Id

        the ResponseBuilder with the new required header
